collection.openText: Those who succeeded in hunt are granted with the feather that countless hunters yearned.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Qliphoth counter decreased when another Abnormality from the $0's department escaped.
When the work result was good, Qlihpoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was moderate, Qlihpoth Counter decreased by a low chance. Moreover, the lower Qliphoth Counter is, the damage employees take when working increased.
When the work result was bad, Qlihpoth Counter increased.
$0 granted light to the employee who worked when Qlihpoth Counter was at 1. The employee’s physical and mental health was healed and kept regenerating for a while.
When the employee had less than 20% of their health, $0 granted the same light as above.

When escaped, $0 returned willingly to its containment chamber after a short time. $0 was aggressive from the time it was damaged, and the employee whose HP or SP was 0 by the $0 attack died. When $0 is attacked, the eyes of the employee are burned by the light emitted by the Abnormality. The blind employee proceeded work at half speed. $0 cured the injured eye when the employee finished the work.
